website_summaries.verdict: Beginners looking for a good value and relatively good battery life should consider this model from MJX. Be aware, though, that it doesn't come with a camera.
pros: Headless mode and one-key return function
Free switching between right-hand and left-hand throttle
cons: Not always responsive to the remote

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made hexacopter but the battery I got with it does not work. I have charged it as per the instructions but when I put it in the hexacopter, it flashes quickly and won't power on. I'd like to get a replacement battery to see if that fixes the problem. Update: Returned it for a new one. The replacement I got is not as well made. It is much less sturdy and very flimsy. One of the motor housings broke and I've had to reinforce them all with electrical tape. I regret this purchase and would recommend sticking with Syma models in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Mourning

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly for experienced
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone but not for beginners. S little tricky yo control & fly The first one did work do sent it back & refunded quickly. Second one I still fly almost every day you can get replacement parts for it if you look stoned on net. I like it do much I ordered another
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Bir

customer_reviews.title: I want one so bad now not even kidding I set the thing up ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a UDI818A1HD and a couple other drones and I bought this model for my cousins son for Christmas because he has been wanting one since I got mine. I thought a hex would be easier to fly for him than a quad. I want one so bad now not even kidding I set the thing up so my little cousin could take it out of the box and it not need to be trimmed or anything, and it flies so much smoother, and I spent probably 2 hours flying it before I put it up without a single crash landing. Definitely recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: hasn't happened yet with 2 hours of intermediate run time but the motors are inexpensive and relatively easy to swap out
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these UAV's. It was intuitive for my 6 year old and my 12 year old to fly right out of the box. The manual is a tough. Flight time is 6-7 min. Range is about 150 ft in open field. Very quite too compared to my Ominus 4 rotor. Motor burnout, hasn't happened yet with 2 hours of intermediate run time but the motors are inexpensive and relatively easy to swap out. Price point at $52 is very good for what you get. Only real fuss is linking the transmitter/receiver, which takes a minute or two and can be frustrating for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Muldor Havinski

customer_reviews.title: The hexacopter to have.  Easy for novices & powerful and agile enough to please any flyer.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, well built and a Great flyer. I flew it hard and crashed it many times. It eventually broke up into pieces. I was somewhat down as I knew I’d miss flying it. And I do. I plan on getting another one soon when my budget allows. It looks really cool in black. Hard to explain unless you see it in the air in person.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Mine was 'possessed'.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully, I just got a defective product but this one flew terribly, especially outdoors. I suspect that this one had defective gyros and accelerometers as it would often suddenly ignore the transmitter and head off on its own even though it had a fresh battery and was only a few feet away. It flew moderately well indoors but any whiff of a breeze would send it off.. This is my 4th multi-rotor, so I consider myself an experienced flyer and none of my others has this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's a hexacopter. My first hex, after many bnf and rtf quads. This hex is not very impressive. I've tried it with and without the legs attached, still not impressed. If you're flying in any wind at all, the thing is constantly trying to correct itself. Slow yaw (on high rates) really kills it. The thing looks amazing, and every time I take it out, I want it to perform as well as it looks. I always end up disappointed. Meh
customer_reviews.author: No Respect

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hexacopter for unbeatable price value
customer_reviews.text: Upon much research before purchasing and after test flying and inspection i have to go with saying that i am not disappoint in design and performance capability. The landing skid arms were not stable for my comfort as i wanted to maintain low profile design so instead i added 3/8" thick adhesive foam strips commonly found in walmart to each of the motor bay arms and front and rear of the main underbelly.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Kovacs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great drone for the money very sturdy and very responsive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone for the money very sturdy and very responsive, and durable...I have gotten it to hights of around 150 ft but being that it is very light it does have a tough time in cross winds at that hight so I would not recommend flying it at that hight for to long unless it is a very calm day,It is much better at lower hights much more fun , very fast as well. If you are looking for a first drone I highly recommend this one I am on my second as my first one I got a little over confident and flew it to high and it flew a way in me.
customer_reviews.author: mike pape

customer_reviews.title: Should be the best drone I own
customer_reviews.text: Should be the best drone I own, if the camera worked! Can only activate camera over wifi. wifi will connect but never light up red or show any video. Useless support from the company. Tried 4 android and 5 apple devices. Wont connect to any of them. This is the suggested camera for this model, the 4010 I think. Good thing they didnt just hard wire a button like the Syma models. If they did that, this would be my best drone. But no camera and crummy support = poor rating for a good drone.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Ratay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent made copter in terms of finish and materials
customer_reviews.text: Excellent made copter in terms of finish and materials...however...I believe it's engineered a bit off in terms of its size versus motors/props/gyro stabilization. I experienced wobbling while taking off, descending, and even attempting slow fluid turns...indoors! I've found several cheaper priced quads that outperform this 6 motor machine. Had to return it. Maybe I got a faulty one???
customer_reviews.author: BEMA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone
customer_reviews.text: This is really a lovely drone, this one is a replacement for the one that flew away from me because i was not flying it in headless mode at the time. This 6 prop drone is very fast and has excellent range, lots of trick flying with flips and high speed climbs. Love it totally.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Max

customer_reviews.title: I call her Night Fury........
customer_reviews.text: The 7 volt battery and 6 motors gives this quad lots of power. The black version is really cool looking, but easy to confuse orientation straight on. I swapped out the motor pods and blades with white to help. It is not as rock solid stable as my Syma X5c-1 (and new version), nor my Hubsan H107. But it is powerful fun to fly. Be sure to set the throttle limit to 50 or below for your first flights, or it may get away from you. Enjoy and fly safe.
customer_reviews.author: AmDIII

customer_reviews.title: very poor customer
customer_reviews.text: First order lacked multiple parts. Second order had 4 clockwise motors and 2 counter clock wise motors (Requires 3 & 3). UESELESS. buy from another company. very poor customer service
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: It's fast and has a good reception. I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful copter . It's fast and has a good reception. I like it . It doesn't have a camera and am planing to buy one. I was in the park in open area and wanted to see how far it would go , it got so far I olmost lost from it my sight ( over 1000 meters) but it still had a very good control.
customer_reviews.author: sergiu

customer_reviews.title: Its a ok hexacopter.
customer_reviews.text: The product i recieved came in a taped up cardboard box and it was very disorganized, but besides that, the copter is very well built, the controlls are a little to all over the place but not hard to get use to. As a side note I feel as if the beginner mode is to stiff ecen for beginners and the advance mode leans waaaay to far like its trying to be a racer or something.
customer_reviews.author: James Konkel

customer_reviews.title: Good multirotor... Bad remote
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional fly time BUT after almost 3 months the headless mode button stopped working. When max distance is reached it can fly away without notice. One propguard broke on first impact at low speed indoors. Conclusion: stay within range to prevent fly aways. Color code for orientation. Not good night flyer since led not bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: B Family

customer_reviews.title: But this could be an easy 5 star if not for the malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Was a 5 star until after about three weeks, the drone only operates in one speed properly. It will not respond to left/right/up/down input in beginner or expert mode. But it does well in advanced/medium speed. The manufacturer could not replace the controller and I really hope that it is the controller. But this could be an easy 5 star if not for the malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Cottman

customer_reviews.title: NOT RESPONDING CORRECTLY.
customer_reviews.text: THIS COPTER FLYS SLOWER THEN ADVERTIZES BUT OK FOR ME. LATELY SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED, AND I'M NOT SURE WHERE TO START FOR HELP. THE COPTER FLIPS EVERYTIME I TAKE IT UP, EVEN WHEN IM NOT PUSHING THE FLIP BUTTON. I GUESS I'LL HAVE TO CALL CUSTOMER SERVICE. :( :(
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very fun but if you fly it fast it will burn ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fun but if you fly it fast it will burn motors frequently. Buy an extra bag of motors, they are super easy to plug new ones in.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gulo

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: hexacopter arrived broken with signs of repair useing glue .Aafter asembly and battary charge atemped to fly and left rear motor fell off. will not be buying any more. Not satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: xxxx

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Did not work, Months later after warranty was up, Sent a new one to help me out. Will Buy again and recommend highly. Don't think twice. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Schneiberg

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this hexacopter!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hexacopter. Easy to fly AND on a cold day you can fly it inside your home. Calibrates really quick and it is super steady. Awesome value!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Its good but not really
customer_reviews.text: It was good but not really it stop working about 2 weeks when I got it. But it go!! Hight up there
customer_reviews.author: jesus olivares

customer_reviews.title: Great drone with a few hiccups .
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone but after about 20 days a motor burned out.the second one I received the remote doesn't connect but my Mjx 800 remote connects to it.i love this drone but there has been a few hiccups I will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bart&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Second One I Get Just Likes To Do Flips On It's Own
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great little quadcopter if it would just only not do flips when I don't even press the button. This was my second one, the first one landed in water and burned out. I never had a problem with it flipping on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Great Flyer for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a great beginner flyer. It is very durable and will take some pretty high falls without breaks. (IE. 50ft) The fly time varies, indoors about 8-9 min, outside "WINDY" about 7-8. I would recommend this to people who are new to flying. Anyone well experienced in flying these things will not be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris lambert

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: controls do not work as advertised and ALL should be recalled. NOT SUITABLE FOR KIDS (under 16)
customer_reviews.author: Warezaholic

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easily broke after 3rd try. Taped back together and it still flies. Its fun.
customer_reviews.author: CoinDad

customer_reviews.title: The auto return feature didn't work and they wouldn't replace ...
customer_reviews.text: The auto return feature didn't work and they wouldn't replace it without sending it back once it hit about 150 in the air it took off by its self never saw it again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Godwin

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: What a hoot! My first drone. Take no shortcuts. Read and understand all instructions. I tried a shortcut and slammed into the ceiling on my first attempt. Scared the hell out of all of us; but it was so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: ZMAN1511944

customer_reviews.title: Good flyer
customer_reviews.text: Second drone so far and this one is very stable to fly. Controller can be tailored to suit. Plenty of spare parts available, camera etc.
customer_reviews.author: Margaritaville

customer_reviews.title: but the durability is awesome, i've crashed it quite a few times
customer_reviews.text: its a little hard to hover, but the durability is awesome, i've crashed it quite a few times.
customer_reviews.author: J.Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Drone
customer_reviews.text: I am to sick to take it back apart all I wanted was another one moatter what I do it will not work
customer_reviews.author: william schlag

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Battery box could be easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised . Battery box could be easier to access. Since the battery leads are on the outside why have a hole in the cover?
customer_reviews.author: otto49

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: Legs that it comes with are cheap and flimsy. I flew this a few times and one of the legs broke .. just from me grabbing it. The other leg broke in the spot where it's fused together. Overall good hexacopter to learn on but not going to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer drone
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer drone. Bought this to practice before I bought my Mavic. Help a ton. And it is fun to fly!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice & powerful Hexacopter, a great addition to my other drones...get it you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: I Am The Entity In Me

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: First MJX ive bought and I wont buy another its a flimsy piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: junior t

customer_reviews.title: ... THESE MOTORS GET A LITTLE DIRT YOUR DONE BUT GREAT TO LEARN HOW TO FLY
customer_reviews.text: ONCE THESE MOTORS GET A LITTLE DIRT YOUR DONE BUT GREAT TO LEARN HOW TO FLY ON
customer_reviews.author: Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 💯🇺🇸💯🇺🇸💯🇺🇸💯🇺🇸💯
customer_reviews.text: I Would Recommend This Hexacopter To Anyone Ots Great Small Light Weight And Super Fast And I Also Crashed It As Soon I tried it 😩😂😩😂😩😂😩😩😩
customer_reviews.author: D.a.v.e

customer_reviews.title: durable and fun.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in flying multirotors, but this copter is very durable,has taken many beatings, and has been flown into many trees. it is also pretty stable in low as well as high flight. shipping was great, arrived far before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and Very good quality item
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as I expected, and Very good quality item. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hexacopter. Very responsive .very good in the wind . Very stable .
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an amateur or old pro
customer_reviews.text: Very stable flyer. Perfect for an amateur or old pro. Very powerful unit.
customer_reviews.author: Roger West

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and pros alike
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a very smooth flyer. The battery life is also good. I want to get the fpv camera too!!!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hex great flyer one of my favorite thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Lousy, its fun to fly but in four months one of the motors quit working, I have had two it it's happened to both of them. MJX X600 X SERIES
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 7 of the MXJ X600, arrived early in tact. Absolutely no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jtiner1981

customer_reviews.title: Mjx x600 just kept going and going LOST!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Woked good untill yesterday may 25th 2016 7:30 p.m eastern time.transmitter lost connection with hexacopter at about 50 feet in air and just kept going and going and going.tried to find but no luck.he is more upset than i am. Dont know what else to do except to get another one.hey at least he still has the transmitter.wish i could get refund but there is no item to return.plus the one shipped had no landing skids and prop guards.maby if he had them to put on it would not have been lost.oh well you win and you lose sum.he wins though because im going to purchase him another one
customer_reviews.author: C R D

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought, but the controls are odd and it is kind of sluggish overall.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Spring

customer_reviews.title: Great copter
customer_reviews.text: It is a great copter. I did my research so i am not surprised with the yaw rate (it is quite slow). I got this one to attach a DIY FPV set up I made and I wanted stability, good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Great copter but not for indoors
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good remote control copter for the money- especially if you're into the flying-only part of it. One word of caution, however; if you're just learning, you'd better have a large indoor area such as a gym (too large for average size living room). Outdoors, just the slightest breeze will have you struggling against anything stronger than a 5 mph instead of concentrating on learning.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Man

customer_reviews.title: No fly
customer_reviews.text: Dislike product can't get it to connect up with remote!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Realy good drone, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Realy good drone, BUT, a motor went on me after only 4 flights (30 min flight time). I wish the motors were a bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Shields

customer_reviews.title: good flyer, durable
customer_reviews.text: Things a tank, good flyer, durable, arrived in two days after first one never showed. Highly recommended flyer.
customer_reviews.author: Fergy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: First time drone or RC user. Definitely recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: Drone is well built and looks great too. Controls are far different from all other ...
customer_reviews.text: Drone is well built and looks great too. Controls are far different from all other drones and I gave this item 2 stars because the transceiver lost connect and drone took off after about 50 feet. Search Giant Hexacopter and get the large UFO one for 115.00. Better control, battery and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Randy P. Mace

customer_reviews.title: Would like to exchange product
customer_reviews.text: Would like to exchange product. When I turned on for the first time a burning smell occurred and I immediately disconnected the battery. When I plugged it back in and turned on the transmitter the drone never lite back on. Would like to exchange for a new one I still have all the new packaging and parts. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Cool drone.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing drone. It crashed from atleast hundred feet on grass and all was fine. It's really fun to fly and the battery lasts longer than 5 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible maneuverability and lack of control
customer_reviews.text: (1) Motor burnt up and seized with less than a half hour of flight time. Horrible maneuverability and lack of control. Steer clear, you can do much better for this price.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, Below Average
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this product. It is okay, but will be looking elsewhere for another. Very flimsy construction

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Whatch my review and flight test at lone star avi on you tube

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy build...!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing two of these quadcopters. BOTH of them broke within the first use! Copter 1, frame cracked in two different place after the third crash landing in the GRASS... Copter 2, one of the wings broke completely off when it hit my wooden fence on it very first landing. My neighbor bought his copter out that is made by a different company, kept crashing it on the ground and his is still in tact...! Enough said...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.VRS

customer_reviews.title: Great for begginers and adults
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This Drone is a lot more agile than the 1st generation of Drones, flips etc The price is also more agile on the wallet too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size drone
customer_reviews.text: Good size drone. Fun to fly the range is kinda short so keep it within 200 feet or so. Flight times around 10-11 min. Make sure you get a couple extra battery's its well worth the extra$$
customer_reviews.author: Gene Moore

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend this to any one.
customer_reviews.text: Not A durable product. crashed on grass and broke one of it leg. Not sure how the fix it as it broke from the edge.

customer_reviews.title: The hexi is definitely a good beginner copter
customer_reviews.text: The hexi is definitely a good beginner copter. Everything was good except it did NOT come with the landing gear parts. Very fun to fly around.

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but.......
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy landing gear, too light. Takes off in the wind too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not establish a signal connection between the device and ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not establish a signal connection between the device and the controller. This thing is called the UFO, does this stand for UnFlying Object? This would receive zero stars if that were an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: cant get it tuned right it just flips over need to send back
customer_reviews.author: burns

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend staying with a good quality name brand quad and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this quad for my son's birthday as he loves my Syma quad. Turned on unit, turned on remote and paired. As soon as pairing was complete, before we could even throttle up to check the trims, quad took of at full throttle and went high out of our vision. We took a walk around the entire neighborhood, but could not find. I would recommend staying with a good quality name brand quad and seriously consider before purchasing this quad.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item, I was holding it until Christmas, only to find the item does not work!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Westfield

product_meta.title: MJX X600 X-SERIES [RX Aerio Exclusive] 2.4GHz 4 Channel 6 Axis RC Remote Control Hexacopter UFO Drone with Headless Mode and Auto-Return Feature (Without Camera - Black)
product_meta.description:
Specification:
Brand name: MJX
Item No.:X600
Item name:X600 X-SERIES RC Hexacopter RTF
Color:Black,White
Frequency 2.4G
Channel 4CH with 6 Axis Gyro
Motor Type Coreless Motor
Main Rotor Diameter 13.5CM
Transmitter GR-246 R/C
Battery for Controller 3"AA" batteries(not included)
Battery for Quadcopter 7.4V 700mAh Li-poly
Charging Time About 120 mins
Flying time About 10 minutes
Controlling Distance About 100 meters 
RC Hexacopter Size 38.5*42.5*6cm
Weight (With gift box) 1.1KG 


Feature: 
-Free switching between Right Hand Throttle and Left Hand Throttle.
-With Headless Mode,no need to adjust the position of aircraft before flying.
-With One Key Return function ,makes it easily to find the way home.
-Quad-rotor design insures more stable and powerful performance easier.
-Adopting 2.4G auto connection technology ,scores of quad-copter can be played at the same time.
-The quadcopter can fly both indoor and outdoor.Including 4CH digital proportional RC system.
-6-Axis gyro quad-rotorcraft flight, strong stability,can easily implement various flight 
movements, stronger wind resistance, easier to control.
-Full charged battery can support 8.5 minutes steady flight.


Package Included: 1 X MJX X600 RC Hexacopter
1 X Transmitter
1 X Charger
6 X Propeller
6 X Protecting frames
6 X Screw
1 X Screwdrive
2 X Landing gear
1 X Manual


Should there be any problems with the product, please feel free to contact us and we would be more than happy to assist you with the issue.
feature_bullets: Product size: 38.5*42.5*6cm. Charging time is about 90-120 minutes while flight duration is about 7-9 minutes.
4 channels function provide stable flying and easy operation.
6-axis gyro with posture control - Integrated design guarantee the precise positioning of the aircraft. Strong wind and drop resistence, easy to fly, stabile flight characteristics.

If you are experiencing trouble pairing the controller with the drone: this issue could be fixed by simply moving the left joystick on the controller up and down so it registers correctly with the drone. It is advised that buyers should let the motor rest between 5-10 minutes between flight times to prevent it from overheating. Continuous usage of the drone without making time for rest causes the motor to burn out, therefore becoming defective.
With Headless Mode,no need to adjust the position of aircraft before flying. With One Key Return function, makes it easily to find the way home.
